couch-db.name: CouchDB
couch-db.description: Base service to access CouchDB databases.

couch-db-content-store.name: CouchDB Content Store
couch-db-content-store.description: A content store that uses a CouchDB database for storage.

couch-db-index.name: CouchDB Index
couch-db-index.description: An index service that stores index data in CouchDB. It can index content not stored in CouchDB.
